DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to evaluate the bioequivalence between bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogens tablets produced using the current manufacturing process to bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogens tablets produced using a new manufacturing process
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogen Tablets In Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy, postmenopausal women aged 35 to 70 years and weighing at least 50 kg (approx. 110 lbs). At least 6 months of spontaneous amenorrhea (with folliclestimulating hormone levels of 39 mIU/mL or greater). Nonsmoker or smoker of fewer than 10 cigarettes per day, with ability to abstain for 5 days. Exclusion Criteria Women with amenorrhea starting after 54 years of age. A history or active presence of clinically important medical diseases. Use of oral estrogen, progestin, androgen, or SERMcontaining drug products within 30 days before receiving study drug.
